name: retrieve_match_info
description: Retrieve related match report that may have additional team and player info from sports knowledge base using video metadata

query.description: Search query describing the game or video content

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 1)

name: retrieve_compliance_requirements
description: Retrieve compliance requirements and standards from compliance knowledge base for specific distribution channels

query.description: Distribution channel or compliance type (e.g., 'social media', 'website', 'broadcast')

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 3)

name: retrieve_news_articles
description: Retrieve news articles from news knowledge base

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 2)

name: retrieve_film_info
description: Retrieve film information from films knowledge base

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 2)

name: lookup_player_info
description: Look up detailed player information (name, position, height, weight) from the player database. Requires the exact team name from match reports and the player's jersey number from the video.

team_name.description: Exact team name with proper capitalization (e.g., 'Alpine Wolves', 'Metropolitan Knights')

name: get_cast_member
description: Look up cast member information from DynamoDB table using name and film

name: identify_people_with_rekognition
description: Use AWS Rekognition to identify people/celebrities in video when names cannot be determined from transcripts or screen text

s3_url.description: S3 URL of the video file (e.g., 's3://bucket/video.mp4')
